subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Horses
lead_paragraph: In running off with the $600,000 first-place check for the Dubai-based Darley Stable, Bernardini demonstrated that he is perhaps untouchable among 3-year-olds.
snippet: In running off with the $600,000 first-place check for the Dubai-based Darley Stable, Bernardini demonstrated that he is perhaps untouchable among 3-year-olds.
